alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Northern Blaine County; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 07 at 7:10AM MST until November 08 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Snowy and Judith Mountains, Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine, Fergus County below 4500ft, Judith Basin County and Judith Gap and Northern Blaine County. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Northern Blaine County; Snowy and Judith Mountains
